Name: Day for Judgment
Rule: Destroy all creatures.

Name: Ancestral Recall
Rule: Draw 3 cards, skip your draw phase.

Name: Reminisce
Rule: Shuffle your graveyard into your library.

Name: Prosperity
Rule: All players draw 1d6 cards.

Name: Demonic Tutor
Rule: Search your library for a card and put it in your hand, then shuffle.

Name: Eureka
Rule: Each player may put one permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. Lose life equal to the converted mana cost.

Name: Exhume
Rule: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.

Name: tnahC smirO
Rule: You can not cast spells this turn. If any player pays 5 life, your creatures can not attack this turn either.

Name: Better Off Dead
Rule: Put a creature card from your graveyard onto the battlefield under target opponents control.

Name: eugitaF
Rule: You can not draw cards this turn.

Name: Global Confusion
Rule: Each player shuffles their hand back into their library.

Name: Temporal Distort
Rule: Skip the next two phases of your turn (combat and end step).

Name: Wheel of Misfortune
Rule: Each player discards their entire hand, then draws a number of cards equal to the number of players.

Name: Sudden Spoiling
Rule: Each player sacrifices a creature, if able.

Name: Mana Drain
Rule: Counter target spell. Its controller loses life equal to the converted mana cost of that spell.

Name: Mind Twist
Rule: Each player discards a number of cards equal to the number of creatures they control.

Name: Time Warp
Rule: Take an extra turn after this one.

Name: Worldfire
Rule: Destroy all permanents. Each player loses life equal to the number of permanents they controlled.

Name: Chaos Warp
Rule: Choose a random card in each player's hand. Exile those cards.

Name: Confusion Spell
Rule: Choose a random spell in each player's hand. Counter those spells.

Name: Memory Lapse
Rule: Each player discards their hand and draws a new hand of cards.

Name: Sudden Impact
Rule: Each player deals 3 damage to each other player.

Name: Timetwister
Rule: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards.

Name: Upheaval
Rule: Destroy all lands. Each player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

Name: Brainstorm
Rule: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

Name: Mystical Tutor
Rule: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it in your hand, then shuffle your library.

Name: Ponder
Rule: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.

Name: Preordain
Rule: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.

Name: Dig
Rule: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.

Name: Impulse
Rule: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put two of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.

Name: Fact or Fiction
Rule: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates them into two piles. Put one pile on the bottom of your library and the other on top.

Name: Sylvan Library
Rule: Whenever you draw a card, you may pay 1 life. If you do, draw an additional card.

Name: Wheel of Fortune
Rule: Each player discards their hand, draws seven cards, then loses 3 life.

Name: Windfall
Rule: Each player discards their hand, draws seven cards, then loses 2 life.

Name: Inspiration
Rule: Draw two cards.

Name: Faithless Looting
Rule: Discard two cards. Draw two cards.

Name: Night's Whisper
Rule: Discard two cards. Draw two cards.

Name: Grim Tutor
Rule: Search your library for a card and put it in your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

Name: Entomb
Rule: Search your library for a card and put it into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

Name: Golgari Grave-Troll
Rule: Whenever a player discards a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Golgari Grave-Troll.

Name: Stinkweed Imp
Rule: Whenever a player discards a card, Stinkweed Imp deals 1 damage to that player.

Name: Mind Grind
Rule: Each player discards cards until they have no cards in hand.

Name: Painful Truths
Rule: Discard three cards. Draw three cards.

Name: Jace's Erasure
Rule: Target player discards two cards at random.

Name: Sudden Edict
Rule: Each player sacrifices a creature.

Name: Diabolic Edict
Rule: Each player sacrifices a creature, or that player loses 2 life.

Name: Go for the Throat
Rule: Destroy target nonland permanent.

Name: Path to Exile
Rule: Exile target permanent. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

Name: Swords to Plowshares
Rule: Exile target creature. Its controller gains 3 life.

Name: Wrath of God
Rule: Destroy all creatures.

Name: Damnation
Rule: Destroy all creatures.

Name: Pyroclasm
Rule: Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less.

Name: Shock
Rule: Deal 2 damage to target creature or player.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Rule: Deal 3 damage to target creature or player.

Name: Fireball
Rule: Fireball deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
